text: @Shehla_Rashid go 2JNU or @deepikapadukone  someat #saheenbagh  #TabligiJamaat @RahulGandhi #TablighiJamatVirus &watch howthe countrylights India #LightForIndia to fight #coronavirus #Covid_19, #CoronavirusPandemic and lament on #PMModi @narendramodi popularity. Some mayfund for future candles
